title: Coutinho (D. Manuel Pereira)
body: He was appointed the general governor of this archipelago on November 22, 1609. After his term, the diocesan bishop D. Fr. Louren√ßo de Tavora temporarily assumed the functions of general governor. However, Coutinho later became the general governor of Angola.

Madeira: Archipelago governed by D. Manuel Pereira Coutinho

D. Manuel Pereira Coutinho: General governor of Madeira and Angola

1609: Appointment as general governor of Madeira
